markdownRemark.html:
Since I am more confortable writing in Javascript that Ruby decided to move from Jekyll to Gatbsy for my personal blogging.

I was kind overwellmed by broken ruby gems and weired errors, so I took the decision for the move. Of course I had to put some effort migrating and leaving my favorite theme Minimal Mistakes in favor of Lumen. With small customizations to adjust some parts I loved from the previous theme to it, and in the end I came up with something very similar :P… The process was really straightforward and in the meantime I had some introduction to React and GraphQL since I have an Angular background. Playing with React was easier than I thought!.

I am going to miss some great features of Jekyll and Ruby but I think I can bear with it.
